channel.title: anr on Zac's blog
channel.description: Recent content in anr on Zac's blog

item.title: ANR Intro
item.description: ANR 原理 ANR 的触发场景 // com/android/server/am/ActivityManagerService.java // 1.Broadcast 广播前台 10s 内未执行，后台 60s 内未执行 // How long we allow a receiver to run before giving up on it. static final int BROADCAST_FG_TIMEOUT = 10*1000; static final int BROADCAST_BG_TIMEOUT = 60*1000; // 2.输入事件分发超过 5s，这里可以包括按键输入和触摸输入 // How long we wait until we timeout on key dispatching. static final int KEY_DISPATCHING_TIMEOUT = 5*1000; // com/android/server/am/ActiveServices.java // 3.前台服务超过 20s 未执行，后台服务超过 200s 未执行 // How long we wait for a service to finish executing.
